description: Update an existing custom line item in the current or previous billing period.

parameters.name: Arn
parameters.description: The ARN of the custom line item to be updated.

parameters.name: ChargeDetails
parameters.description: A ListCustomLineItemChargeDetails containing the new charge details for the custom line item. Flat (dict) --- An UpdateCustomLineItemFlatChargeDetails that describes the new charge details of a flat custom line item. The custom line item's new fixed charge value in USD. Percentage (dict) --- An UpdateCustomLineItemPercentageChargeDetails that describes the new charge details of a percentage custom line item. The custom line item's new percentage value. This will be multiplied against the combined value of its associated resources to determine its charge value. LineItemFilters (list) --- A representation of the line item filter. (dict) --- A representation of the line item filter for your custom line item. You can use line item filters to include or exclude specific resource values from the billing group's total cost. For example, if you create a custom line item and you want to filter out a value, such as Savings Plan discounts, you can update LineItemFilter to exclude it. The attribute of the line item filter. This specifies what attribute that you can filter on. The match criteria of the line item filter. This parameter specifies whether not to include the resource value from the billing group total cost. The values of the line item filter. This specifies the values to filter on. Currently, you can only exclude Savings Plan discounts. (string) ---

nested_params.name: Flat
nested_params.description: An UpdateCustomLineItemFlatChargeDetails that describes the new charge details of a flat custom line item.

nested_params.name: ChargeValue
nested_params.description: The custom line item's new fixed charge value in USD.

nested_params.name: Percentage
nested_params.description: An UpdateCustomLineItemPercentageChargeDetails that describes the new charge details of a percentage custom line item.

nested_params.name: PercentageValue
nested_params.description: The custom line item's new percentage value. This will be multiplied against the combined value of its associated resources to determine its charge value.

nested_params.name: LineItemFilters
nested_params.description: A representation of the line item filter.

nested_params.name: Attribute
nested_params.description: The attribute of the line item filter. This specifies what attribute that you can filter on.

nested_params.name: MatchOption
nested_params.description: The match criteria of the line item filter. This parameter specifies whether not to include the resource value from the billing group total cost.

nested_params.name: Values
nested_params.description: The values of the line item filter. This specifies the values to filter on. Currently, you can only exclude Savings Plan discounts.

parameters.name: BillingPeriodRange
parameters.description: The billing period range in which the custom line item request will be applied. The inclusive start billing period that defines a billing period range where a custom line is applied. ExclusiveEndBillingPeriod (string) --- The inclusive end billing period that defines a billing period range where a custom line is applied.

nested_params.name: InclusiveStartBillingPeriod
nested_params.description: The inclusive start billing period that defines a billing period range where a custom line is applied.

nested_params.name: ExclusiveEndBillingPeriod
nested_params.description: The inclusive end billing period that defines a billing period range where a custom line is applied.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the successfully updated custom line item.

nested_items.name: BillingGroupArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the billing group that the custom line item is applied to.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the successfully updated custom line item.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of the successfully updated custom line item.

nested_items.name: ChargeDetails
nested_items.description: A ListCustomLineItemChargeDetails containing the charge details of the successfully updated custom line item.

nested_items.name: ChargeValue
nested_items.description: The custom line item's fixed charge value in USD.

nested_items.name: Percentage
nested_items.description: A ListCustomLineItemPercentageChargeDetails that describes the charge details of a percentage custom line item.

nested_items.name: PercentageValue
nested_items.description: The custom line item's percentage value. This will be multiplied against the combined value of its associated resources to determine its charge value.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The type of the custom line item that indicates whether the charge is a fee or credit.

nested_items.name: LineItemFilters
nested_items.description: A representation of the line item filter.

nested_items.name: Attribute
nested_items.description: The attribute of the line item filter. This specifies what attribute that you can filter on.

nested_items.name: MatchOption
nested_items.description: The match criteria of the line item filter. This parameter specifies whether not to include the resource value from the billing group total cost.

nested_items.name: Values
nested_items.description: The values of the line item filter. This specifies the values to filter on. Currently, you can only exclude Savings Plan discounts.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: The most recent time when the custom line item was modified.

nested_items.name: AssociationSize
nested_items.description: The number of resources that are associated to the custom line item.
